717577f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 55th Street
717577f-a.text:
Broadway, east side, from 55th to 56th Streets, showing the
Sonoma and Rockingham Apartments.
June, 1925.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
Ne 2,07

717579f-b.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 55th Street
717579f-b.text:
(1)
Broadway, east side, north from West 55th to 57th Streets. Tho
demolition in the foreground between West 55th and 56th Streets, was
the former site of the Sonoma and Rockingham, apartment hotels.
The Broadway Tabernacle (Congregational), appears at the N.E. corner of
56th Street, with the 9-story Sadillac salesroom (General Motors Co),
adjoining same, and ocoupying the S.E. corner of 57th Street.
August 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPPODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from a slightly different angle.
August 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

717580f-c.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 55th Street
717580f-c.text:
(1)
1731-1745 Broadway, west side, from West 55th to 56th Streets.
This view does not show the entire building, at the S.W. corner of West
56th Street. Clearance in the foreground, is ohn east side of Broad-
way; the former sites of the Sonoma and Rockingham Apartment Hotels.
August 28, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A view mainly of Nos. 1739 (1-story) and No. 1741 (4-stories).
August 28, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The new Dodge Automobile sho rooms, Nos. 1743-1745, at the S.W. cor-
hner of W,st 56th Street. Also shown, is a view westward, on the south
side of 56th Street to Eighth Ave.
s4
August 28, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

717578f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 55th Street (West)
717578f-a.text:
Broadway, east side, north fromm West 55th Street.
The two story taxpayer with the Hudson Motor Co. sign
atop, is at the N. E. corner of this point. Ocoupying
a similar location at 56th Street, is the Broadway
Tabernacle Church. Adjoining same is the Cadillac
Motor Co. at 57th Street. Above, utilising the 57th
to 58th Street frontage are the 26 story No. 1778 Broad-
way and the 20 story U. S. Rubber Co. buildings. In 1940
the latter will remove to their new building in Rockefeller
Center on Sixth Avenuso Separating the aforementioned
wtructures is the 12 story Goodrich Tire Co. Bldg.
Note the twin towered Century Apartments up Broadway.
This is located on Central Park West and West 62nd Street.
